sections.heading: 2. Hosting & Log Files
paragraphs: When visiting this website, technical data (IP address, date/time, user-agent) is processed on the server.
Processing is required to deliver the site and ensure operational security (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR).

sections.heading: 3. Contact
paragraphs: If you contact us, we process the data you provide to handle your request (Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR).

sections.heading: 4. Your rights
paragraphs: You have the right of access, rectification, erasure, restriction, data portability and to object.
You may also lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority.
